name: cbig_gpan_national2000
title: Zonation results data for national analysis for year 2000.
description: Datapackage (3 out of 4) for the publication 'Global protected area expansion is compromised by projected land-use and parochialism'

fields.name: pr_lost
fields.title: Proportion of landscape lost
fields.description: The proportion of the landscape removed in percents ([0-100]).

fields.name: pr_rem
fields.title: Proportion of landscape remaining
fields.description: The proportion of landscape remaining in percents ([0-100], 1-pr_lost).

fields.name: ave_pr_rem
fields.title: Average proportion remaining
fields.description: The average proportion over all species in percents ([0-100]).

fields.name: amphibians
fields.title: Average proportion remaining for amphibians
fields.description: The average proportion over amphibian species in percents ([0-100]).

fields.name: birds
fields.title: Average proportion remaining for birds
fields.description: The average proportion over bird species in percents ([0-100]).

fields.name: mammals
fields.title: Average proportion remaining for mammals
fields.description: The average proportion over mammal species in percents ([0-100]).

fields.name: reptiles
fields.title: Average proportion remaining for reptiles
fields.description: The average proportion over reptile species in percents ([0-100]).

fields.name: LC
fields.title: Average proportion remaining for LC species
fields.description: The average proportion over all species with IUCN category LC in percents ([0-100]).

fields.name: NT
fields.title: Average proportion remaining for NT species
fields.description: The average proportion over all species with IUCN category NT in percents ([0-100]).

fields.name: VU
fields.title: Average proportion remaining for VU species
fields.description: The average proportion over all species with IUCN category VU in percents ([0-100]).

fields.name: EN
fields.title: Average proportion remaining for EN species
fields.description: The average proportion over all species with IUCN category EN in percents ([0-100]).

fields.name: CR
fields.title: Average proportion remaining for CR species
fields.description: The average proportion over all species with IUCN category CR in percents ([0-100]).

fields.name: endangered
fields.title: Average proportion remaining for all endangered species
fields.description: The average proportion remaining for all endangered species (IUCN categories EN, VU and CR)  in percents ([0-100]).
